name: The North Face Hedgehog Futurelight Light Trail Shoes - Women's
description: Go ahead and make it a long weekend. The Hedgehog hiking shoe is built tough and supportive for comfort on uneven trails or when carrying mid-weight loads. A durable upper is paired with the super-breathable  membrane, so you can stomp through rocky sections or streams with confidence. The lugged sole and sticky rubber keep you steady on slippery or loose terrain, so you can focus on the view.Leather, Nubuck and abrasion-resistant mesh upper balance protection and breathability.Welded midfoot underlays add support.FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable.Eco-friendly OrthoLite® X35 Hybrid™ footbed for underfoot comfort.Cradle™ heel stabilizes your foot on uneven terrain.Single-density EVA midsole provides cushion on the trail.ESS midfoot plate and nylon shank protect against impacts and add torsional rigidity.Vibram® XS Trek outsole sticks to whatever the trail throws at you.
